title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_Sh%C5%8Dnen_Jump%2B
transformers_text: Sh nen Jump Japanese Hepburn Sh nen Jan pu Pura su is a manga platform created by Shueisha Launched on September 22 2014 it operates as a free mobile app and website 3 Jump serializes original titles and titles from other Shueisha manga magazines and also carries digital editions of Weekly Sh nen Jump Notable titles serialized in Sh nen Jump include Fire Punch Chainsaw Man Hell's Paradise Jigoku rak u Spy Family Chained Soldier Kai ju No 8 and Dan dadan Despite its title Sh nen Jump also features series targeted towards female and adult readers in addition to its namesakes h nen manga which is targeted towards young teen males 4 Outside of Japan Shueisha releases the original manga from the platform on Manga Plus Starting in 2023 every new manga series except for licensed manga and Indies series launched on Sh nen Jump would receive a simultaneous English release on Manga Plus Shueisha's Weekly Sh nen Jump reached a peak weekly circulation of 6 53 million copies in the 1990 s though its readership has since steadily declined as a result of the broader decline of the print media industry In response Shueisha turned towards digital distribution in an attempt to reach out to a wider audience 5 A free digital edition of Weekly Sh nen Jump was issued as a result of the 2011 T hoku earthquake and tsunami after shipping and distribution lines were affected by the disaster Issuing the digital magazine was difficult at that time because of different work flows from issuing printed version In 2012 Shueisha launched the online bookstore app Jump Book Store which enjoyed mild commercial success and became an inspiration for Sh nen Jump 6 In 2013 Shueisha launched the online manga platform Jump LIVE Although the app was downloaded over 1 million times in three weeks the editorial department found it contained too much content and it was difficult to distinguish between free and paid content Shueisha would ultimately discontinue the platform Nevertheless the experience of launching an online platform helped the company for the coming Sh nen Jump 7 8 Sh nen Jump was launched on September 22 2014 with more than 30 manga series some of which were transferred from Jump LIVE including lD LIVE and Ne koda bi yori The digital version of Weekly Sh nen Jump can be purchased in Sh nen Jump at 300 yen per issue or 900 yen per month 3 9 Compared to Weekly Sh nen Jump titles published in Sh nen Jump are subject to laxer editorial restrictions around explicit content According to Shuhei Hos ono the chief editor of Sh nen Jump the number of weekly active users increased from 1 1 million to 1 3 million between April and May 2016 Hos ono noted that the increase was catalyzed by the release of Fire Punch and World's End Harem which both contain depictions of sex and violence not permitted in Weekly Sh nen Jump 10 Starting from 2017 Weekly Sh nen Jump began serializing works made by manga artists who previously published their series on Sh nen Jump such as Taishi Tsu tsui's We Never Learn Tatsu ki Fujimoto's Chainsaw Man and Tsu run Hatom une's Mi tama Security Spirit Busters 11 In 2019 the platform experienced significant progress 12 Spy Family which was a new series in 2019 attracted many users to the app especially female users After it began serialization the proportion of female users increased by 5 while 60 65 were male 13 Astra Lost in Space received an anime adaptation and E ren the Southpaw received a TV drama adaptation in 2019 both are original titles of Sh nen Jump Moreover its original titles started to win big awards 12 Astra Lost in Space won the 12 th Manga Taish Award becoming the first web comic to do so 14 Manga Plus a global version of Sh nen Jump was launched on January 28 2019 An international edition of Sh nen Jump was first proposed in 2017 as a means to appeal to non Japanese audiences the app is offered in English and Spanish 5 Also in 2019 Shueisha produced Marvel Sh nen Jump Super Collaboration a collaboration series with Marvel Comics composed of seven one shots written by various Weekly Sh nen Jump artists including Yu Gi Oh 's Kazuki Takahashi 15 In December 2020 Dead pool Samurai started serialization on the same platform after the one shot in October 2019 In 2020 due to the C OVID 19 pandemic some titles in Sh nen Jump have been published on a modified schedule 16 A website namely Jump Digital La bo was launched by the editorial department of Sh nen Jump in July 2020 for recruiting proposals of digital development 17 Kai ju No 8 which was serialized from July 2020 to July 2025 gained 30 million page views in October 2020 becoming the fastest Sh nen Jump manga to do so 18 On December 14 2020 it was announced that the second part of Chainsaw Man the first part of which had previously been serialized on Weekly Sh nen Jump will be serialized on Sh nen Jump 19 In April 2021 Indie series were introduced in the app This is a side project from the Shonen Jump App for Jump Rookie Monthly Award winner works that get in the platform with new titles every month along regular titles These series have no editor their publishing conditions differ from regular serialization s and they have an orange flame symbol showing they are indie and how different they are from normal serialization s So far only two Indies series became regular serialization s Red Cat Ramen and Kindergarten Wars 20 In 2023 every new manga series not including Indies series and licensed series launched on Sh nen Jump would begin to receive a simultaneous English release on Manga Plus 21 By May 2019 over 60 titles were serialized on Sh nen Jump The app had been downloaded 10 million times combined the app and website had 2 5 million weekly active users Sh nen Jump accumulated over 12 billion yen in sales revenue 13 As of February 2022 the app had been downloaded 19 million times with the app and website having approximately 4 6 million weekly active users Shueisha estimated Sh nen Jump 's users to be 65 male and that 18 to 24 year olds were its largest age demographic at 32 22 Hell's Paradise Jigoku rak u was the most popular series on the platform in 2018 23 while Spy Family has been the most popular Sh nen Jump title since 2019 24 Spy Family is noted for attracting readers especially female to the app 11 according to Hos ono the trend of its sales are comparable to Assassination Classroom a high profile title published in Weekly Sh nen Jump 11 Due to explicit content World's End Harem and Saotome Shima i wa Manga no Tame nara cannot be accessed on the Sh nen Jump iOS app but they are available on its website and Android app 25 26 27 There are currently 90 manga titles being serialized in Sh nen Jump Out of those 69 are original titles to the platform 8 titles are published in parallel with other Shueisha publications and 11 are Indies series
